attributes.action: Instal legislation to require judges to insure against falling asleep during any trial they are listed for.
attributes.additional_details: The taxpayer MUST be entitled to be protected against picking up the tab for retrials when judges, who live in luxurious tax payer funded, servant manned houses while hearing a case anyway, are unable to demonstrate the importance of their role by, at least, staying awake during proceedings. Judges need to take out insurance to cover ALL costs of a retrial in a case during which they are found to be asleep.
